mapper.select: select * from bookmng.borrow_history where book_id=#{bookId} and user_id=#{userId} order by create_date_time desc LIMIT 1

select book.book_name,book.author_name,count(*) as BorrowCount from bookmng.borrow_history join bookmng.book on book.book_id=borrow_history.book_id group by bookmng.book.book_name order by BorrowCount desc
select user.user_name,count(*) as BorrowCount from bookmng.borrow_history join bookmng.user on user.user_id=borrow_history.user_id group by borrow_history.user_id order by BorrowCount desc
mapper.update: update bookmng.borrow_history set delete_flag=1 where history_id=#{historyId}
